alert.note: Alert for Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Walker and northern Dade Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Trenton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Chickamauga, Fairview, Stephensville, Noble, Chattanooga Valley, New England, Morganville, Cloudland Canyon State Park, Cooper Heights and Rock Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
